name: Sē by Tetrad Studios
description:
Welcome Oceanographers! 

Get ready to dive and navigate in this 2 player adventure game! The game takes place in the Pacific Ocean where 2 oceanographers are looking to capture rare aquatic creatures to further their research.

________________________________________________________________________________

      

Collect rare aquatic animals before your oxygen runs out and avoid dangerous animals that lurk nearby. Swim using the arrow keys or the WASD keys.

_______________________________________________________________________________

Guide the diver to the locations of the rare animals while alerting the diver about the dangerous animals. Navigate by clicking & dragging  on the sonar system using the left mouse button.


Quickly toggle the creature view using the spacebar. Use the escape key to go back to the main menu.

Good luck and have fun!

_______________________________________________________________________________

Isabelle Potvin
Anna Goodman
Deka Said
Niki Roy
